title: Day Trip to Sintra
content: Sintra, a fairytale escape from Lisbon, is home to extravagant palaces and lush gardens. Explore the colorful Pena Palace, wander through the mystical gardens of Quinta da Regaleira, and hike to the Castle of the Moors for stunning views over the landscape. Sintra's dreamlike atmosphere and royal history make it an unmissable day trip from Lisbon.
